::Vamprah::

Vamprah smiled them.

"Pain is not problem " She said "Wound is deep and something damaged 
my internal repartion circuits that change at best mode would be a 
little help... "

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Diamond::
> 
> She looked at Vamprah, "If you are in pain, I can deaden the pain 
for 
> you." She smiled,"You won't be able to feel your arm either for a 
> little while, but at least it won't hurt."
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> > ::DevilDuer::
> > 
> > "New location, maybe," DevilDuer answers Diamond, glancing at 
> Vamprah.
> > 
> > "Hey, do ya have internal repairs? You could go to beast mode and 
> let 
> > them fix ya."
> >
